item.description:
Let’s take advantage of the beautiful outdoors.
See you at our first BostonLOA POTLUCK PICNIC on the GREEN...
A time to hang out & connect, join in some fun activities

A special THANKS to the following members who will share some fun activities with us:

- Yuliya Cohen www.yuliyacohen.com
- Diane http://lawofattractio...
- Suzy Spivey www.suzyspivey.com
- Beth Sobiloff www.birchwoodenterprises.com


Everybody, pliz bring:
- a potluck entrée to share
- own drinks
- blankets
- lawn chairs
- bug spray

We’ll provide:
- napkins, plates & cups
- desserts

We’ll be inviting members from other LOA-related meetups to join us…the more, the merrier!
================

Directions: go to Files tab: " Directions_Artesani Park_Picnic "
- We’ll be the FUN group picnicking on grass between Public Theatre & Public Boat Rental.


**Rain Place: Tia’s On the Waterfront
http://www.tiaswaterf...


================

Do check the Message Board for info/ discussions from members.
You're welcome to post LOA-related discussions there too.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: First BostonLOA POTLUCK PICNIC on the GREEN
